```{r}
# attach packages
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
library(patchwork)
library(ggrepel)
library(gghighlight)
library(ggExtra)
library(ggbeeswarm)
```

```{r}
lizards <- read_csv(here("data_tidy", "lizards.csv"))
```


```{r}
ggplot(lizards, aes(x = total_length, y = weight)) + geom_point(aes(x = total_length, y = weight))


ggplot(data = lizards) + 
  geom_point(aes(x = total_length, y = weight))

ggplot() + 
  geom_point(data = lizards, aes(x = total_length, y = weight))
```


```{r}
ggplot(lizards, aes(x = total_length)) + geom_histogram()
```

```{r}
ggplot(lizards, aes(y = common_name, x = weight)) + geom_jitter()
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = lizards, aes(x = weight)) + geom_histogram(fill = "slateblue4",
                                                         linewidth = 2,
                                                         linetype = "dotted")
```



```{r}
ggplot(data = lizards, aes(x = total_length, y =weight)) + 
  geom_point(color = "#3E92CC",
             fill = "#18435A",
             shape = 22, 
             size = 3,
             alpha = 0.2)
  
ggplot(lizards, aes(x = total_length, y = weight)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = common_name,
                 size = total_length),
             alpha = .5) + 
  scale_color_discrete(type = c("blue",
                                  "green",
                                  "yellow",
                                  "pink",
                                  "orange",
                                  "gold",
                                  "red"))
```


```{r}
ggplot(lizards, aes(x = site, y = weight)) + geom_jitter(aes(color =  common_name)) + 
  theme_minimal()
```


```{r}
ggplot(lizards, aes(x = total_length, y = weight)) + geom_point() +
  labs(x = "Total length (mm)",
       y = "Weight (grams)",
       title = "Lizard size")

```


```{r}
ggplot(lizards, aes(x = total_length, y = weight)) + 
  geom_point() +
  facet_wrap(~common_name, ncol = 3, scales = "free") + 
  labs(x = "Total Length (mm)",
       y = "Weight (grams)")
  
```

```{r}
ggplot(lizards, aes(x = total_length, y = weight)) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_grid(sex ~ tail)
```

```{r}
lizards_count <- lizards %>%
  count(common_name) %>%

ggplot(lizards_count, 
       aes(y = fct_reorder(common_name, n), x = n)) + 
  geom_col()

```

```{r}
ggplot(lizards, aes(x = total_length, y = weight)) + 
  geom_point(aes(colour = common_name),
             size = 2) +
  theme_minimal() + 
  labs(x = "Total length (mm)",
       y = "weight (g)",
       color = "Lizards species") + 
  facet_wrap(~common_name, scales = "free")
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = lizards, aes(y = fct_infreq(common_name))) + 
  geom_bar(aes(fill = site)) + 
  theme_minimal() + 
  labs(x = "Lizard counts",
      y = "Species (common name)") +
  facet_grid(sex ~ tail)

```
